question: Ayodhya city of Uttar Pradesh enlisted their name in the Guinness World Records by lighting 6 lakh earthen lamps on the bank of which of the following river?
explanation: Ayodhya city of Uttar Pradesh enlisted their name in the Guinness World Records by lighting 6 lakh earthen lamps on the bank of the Sarayu river (Ram ki Paidhi Ghat). They made the record during Deepotsav celebrations on the eve of Diwali 2019.
